name: Armani
greetingDialogue: Hello. My hair needs to be cut.

dialogues.text: I don't want to talk about the new haircut of the month. I just have no opinion about it or about the Party, okay?

responses.text: What haircut do you want then?

dialogues.text: I don't want anything really. So I don't make a fuss about it and stay away from choosing any side.

responses.text: Why don't you pick another haircut?

dialogues.text: I don't. Hair is hair, it has shape, end of discussion. Why is it even a deal for people?

responses.text: You must look at the bigger picture.

dialogues.text: That's stupid. Is there any way in which I can be not involved in politics? I just want an easy life.
Because, eh... then I'd still have to decide on a look. And we would be all the way back at the start.
You mean that hair is a small part of the bigger problem called discrimination? I have never discriminated anyone in my life.
Yes, no. I don't want to get involved with politics, or democracy and voting. I mean, what's in it for me?
